com.paypal.adaptive.api.requests
Class ConvertCurrencyRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.paypal.adaptive.api.requests.ConvertCurrencyRequest

public class ConvertCurrencyRequest
extends java.lang.Object

The ConvertCurrency API provides Foreign Exchange currency conversion rates for a list of amounts.
